com.acmetelecom

Class CallEventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acmetelecom.CallEventManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICallEventManager

    public class CallEventManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICallEventManager
    The CallEventManager is responsible for handling call events, grouping them together to make complete calls and storing the call logs for all customers.

      • handleEvent

        public void handleEvent(CallEvent event)
        Handles incoming call events. If finds a start and end event for a particular call then groups them together into a single Call object and stores it in call logs.
        Specified by:
        handleEvent in interface ICallEventManager
        Parameters:
        event - The incoming call event to handle.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if caller starts two calls with same callee simultaneously.
